data.name: Holy Light
data.oracle_text: Nonwhite creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: "Bathed in hallowed light, the infidels looked upon the impurities of their souls and despaired." —*The Book of Tal*

data.name: Hostile Takeover
data.oracle_text: Up to one target creature has base power and toughness 1/1 until end of turn. Up to one other target creature has base power and toughness 4/4 until end of turn. Then Hostile Takeover deals 3 damage to each creature.
data.flavor_text: Ob Nixilis smiled. It had been over one thousand years since his last conquest.

data.name: Hostile Takeover
data.oracle_text: Up to one target creature has base power and toughness 1/1 until end of turn. Up to one other target creature has base power and toughness 4/4 until end of turn. Then Hostile Takeover deals 3 damage to each creature.

data.name: Hour of Devastation
data.oracle_text: All creatures lose indestructible until end of turn. Hour of Devastation deals 5 damage to each creature and each non-Bolas planeswalker.
data.flavor_text:
"Everything here exists or perishes at my whim. Including you, Gatewatch."
—Nicol Bolas

data.name: Hour of Reckoning
data.oracle_text:
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
Destroy all nontoken creatures.
data.flavor_text: Those who are chosen do not doubt. Those who remain do not lament.

data.name: Hour of Reckoning
data.oracle_text:
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
Destroy all nontoken creatures.
data.flavor_text:
"Ravnica, like a hedge, must be pruned, leaving only leaves of verdant uniformity."
—Niszka, Selesnya evangel

data.name: Howling Gale
data.oracle_text:
Howling Gale deals 1 damage to each creature with flying and each player.
Flashback {1}{G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

data.name: Hurly-Burly
data.oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Hurly-Burly deals 1 damage to each creature without flying.
• Hurly-Burly deals 1 damage to each creature with flying.
data.flavor_text:
"Things were popping like corn in a skillet. Olly landed in the pig pen with his prize sow on top of him, both squealin' like boggarts."
—Deagan, cenn of Burrenton

data.name: Hurricane
data.oracle_text: Hurricane deals X damage to each creature with flying and each player.

data.name: Hurricane
data.oracle_text: Hurricane deals X damage to each creature with flying and each player.

data.name: Hurricane
data.oracle_text: Hurricane deals X damage to each creature with flying and each player.

data.name: Hurricane
data.oracle_text: Hurricane deals X damage to each creature with flying and each player.
data.flavor_text:
"This was quite possibly the least pleasant occurrence on the entire expedition."
—Disa the Restless, journal entry

data.name: Hurricane
data.oracle_text: Hurricane deals X damage to each creature with flying and each player.

data.name: Ichor Explosion
data.oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
All creatures get -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the sacrificed creature's power.
data.flavor_text: The first explosion that didn't excite goblins.

data.name: Immolating Gyre
data.oracle_text: Immolating Gyre deals X damage to each creature and planeswalker you don't control, where X is the number of instant and sorcery cards in your graveyard.
data.flavor_text: "Nice army you had there."

data.name: Incandescent Aria
data.oracle_text: Incandescent Aria deals 3 damage to each nontoken creature.
data.flavor_text: As the assassins converged on Kitt Kanto, she struck a high note and held it, unbroken, for nearly a minute. When the room fell silent, she was surrounded only by rose petals falling gently to the floor.

data.name: Incandescent Aria
data.oracle_text: Incandescent Aria deals 3 damage to each nontoken creature.

data.name: Incendiary Command
data.oracle_text:
Choose two —
• Incendiary Command deals 4 damage to target player or planeswalker.
• Incendiary Command deals 2 damage to each creature.
• Destroy target nonbasic land.
• Each player discards all the cards in their hand, then draws that many cards.

data.name: Incendiary Sabotage
data.oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice an artifact.
Incendiary Sabotage deals 3 damage to each creature.
data.flavor_text: "All of those Consulate safety measures undone with one simple tweak."

data.name: Incite Rebellion
data.oracle_text: For each player, Incite Rebellion deals damage to that player and each creature that player controls equal to the number of creatures they control.
data.flavor_text: Nothing breaks the monotony like a good old-fashioned riot.

data.name: Inferno
data.oracle_text: Inferno deals 6 damage to each creature and each player.
data.flavor_text:
"Some have said there is no subtlety to destruction. You know what? They're dead."
—Wandering mage

data.name: Inferno
data.oracle_text: Inferno deals 6 damage to each creature and each player.
data.flavor_text:
"Some have said there is no subtlety to destruction. You know what? They're dead."
—Jaya Ballard, task mage

data.name: Inferno
data.oracle_text: Inferno deals 6 damage to each creature and each player.
data.flavor_text: "Any scrap of compassion that still existed in my soul was permanently snuffed out when they cast me out into the flames." —Mairsil, called the Pretender

data.name: Inferno
data.oracle_text: Inferno deals 6 damage to each creature and each player.
data.flavor_text:
"Some have said there is no subtlety to destruction. You know what? They're dead."
—Jaya Ballard, task mage

data.name: Infest
data.oracle_text: All creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn.
data.flavor_text:
"This is why we don't go out in banewasp weather."
—Rannon, Vithian holdout

data.name: Infest
data.oracle_text: All creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn.
data.flavor_text:
"It is from Phage that this evil springs, and to her it shall return."
—Akroma, angelic avenger

data.name: Infest
data.oracle_text: All creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn.

data.name: Inflame
data.oracle_text: Inflame deals 2 damage to each creature dealt damage this turn.
data.flavor_text: A Vulshok weapon strikes with the fire of the forge that made it.

data.name: Inflame
data.oracle_text: Inflame deals 2 damage to each creature dealt damage this turn.
data.flavor_text: Wound, maim, kill: it's all the same to a Keldon.

data.name: In Garruk's Wake
data.oracle_text: Destroy all creatures you don't control and all planeswalkers you don't control.
data.flavor_text: Beyond pain, beyond obsession and wild despair, there lies a place of twisted power only the most tormented souls can reach.

data.name: In Garruk's Wake
data.oracle_text: Destroy all creatures you don't control and all planeswalkers you don't control.
data.flavor_text: Beyond pain, beyond obsession and wild despair, there lies a place of twisted power only the most tormented souls can reach.

data.name: Inundate
data.oracle_text: Return all nonblue creatures to their owners' hands.
data.flavor_text: "For years, the landfolk have emptied their refuse into the waters. It's time to return the favor."

data.name: Jokulhaups
data.oracle_text: Destroy all artifacts, creatures, and lands. They can't be regenerated.
data.flavor_text:
"The raging waters had swept away trees, bridges, and even houses. My healers had much work to do."
—Halvor Arenson, Kjeldoran priest

data.name: Jokulhaups
data.oracle_text: Destroy all artifacts, creatures, and lands. They can't be regenerated.
data.flavor_text:
"I was shocked when I first saw the aftermath of the Yavimaya Valley disaster. The raging waters had swept away trees, bridges, and even houses. My healers had much work to do."
—Halvor Arenson, Kjeldoran Priest

data.name: Jund Charm
data.oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Exile target player's graveyard.
• Jund Charm deals 2 damage to each creature.
• Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature.
data.flavor_text: Jund pulses with raw energy, waiting for shamans to shape it into useful form.

data.name: Kaervek's Hex
data.oracle_text: Kaervek's Hex deals 1 damage to each nonblack creature and an additional 1 damage to each green creature.
data.flavor_text:
"If the curse does not strike you dead, question your soul."
—Kaervek

data.name: Kaya's Wrath
data.oracle_text: Destroy all creatures. You gain life equal to the number of creatures you controlled that were destroyed this way.
data.flavor_text: Teysa convened the meeting of the Obzedat. Kaya ended it.

data.name: Killing Wave
data.oracle_text: For each creature, its controller sacrifices it unless they pay X life.
data.flavor_text:
"I come looking for demons and I find a plane full of angels. I hate angels."
—Liliana Vess

data.name: Killing Wave
data.oracle_text: For each creature, its controller sacrifices it unless they pay X life.

data.name: Kindle the Carnage
data.oracle_text: Discard a card at random. If you do, Kindle the Carnage deals damage equal to that card's mana value to each creature. You may repeat this process any number of times.
data.flavor_text: "Start knockin' heads, boys, and don't stop 'til the ragamuffyn sings!"

data.name: Kindred Dominance
data.oracle_text: Choose a creature type. Destroy all creatures that aren't of the chosen type.
data.flavor_text: In the end, the lights fade, the land withers, and only the dead and vile remain.

data.name: Kirtar's Wrath
data.oracle_text:
Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated.
Threshold — If seven or more cards are in your graveyard, instead destroy all creatures, then create two 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying. Creatures destroyed this way can't be regenerated.

data.name: Klauth's Will
data.oracle_text:
Choose one. If you control a commander as you cast this spell, you may choose both.
• Breathe Flame — Klauth's Will deals X damage to each creature without flying.
• Smash Relics — Destroy up to X target artifacts and/or enchantments.

data.name: Kozilek's Return
data.oracle_text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
Kozilek's Return deals 2 damage to each creature.
Whenever you cast an Eldrazi creature spell with mana value 7 or greater, you may exile Kozilek's Return from your graveyard. If you do, Kozilek's Return deals 5 damage to each creature.

data.name: Languish
data.oracle_text: All creatures get -4/-4 until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: Life is such a fragile thing.

data.name: Last One Standing
data.oracle_text: Choose a creature at random, then destroy the rest.
data.flavor_text: Some train all their lives for a shot at the title. Some just get really, really lucky.

data.name: Lavaball Trap
data.oracle_text:
If an opponent had two or more lands enter the battlefield under their control this turn, you may pay {3}{R}{R} rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Destroy two target lands. Lavaball Trap deals 4 damage to each creature.

data.name: Lavalanche
data.oracle_text: Lavalanche deals X damage to target player or planeswalker and each creature that player or that planeswalker's controller controls.
data.flavor_text: Alara's burning blood cannot be contained by mere earth and stone.

data.name: Life's Finale
data.oracle_text: Destroy all creatures, then search target opponent's library for up to three creature cards and put them into their graveyard. Then that player shuffles.
data.flavor_text: The feeble resistance of the flesh is over. Phyrexia spreads its shadow over all.

data.name: Living Death
data.oracle_text: Each player exiles all creature cards from their graveyard, then sacrifices all creatures they control, then puts all cards they exiled this way onto the battlefield.

data.name: Living Death
data.oracle_text: Each player exiles all creature cards from their graveyard, then sacrifices all creatures they control, then puts all cards they exiled this way onto the battlefield.

data.name: Living End
data.oracle_text:
Suspend 3—{2}{B}{B}
Each player exiles all creature cards from their graveyard, then sacrifices all creatures they control, then puts all cards they exiled this way onto the battlefield.

data.name: Magmaquake
data.oracle_text: Magmaquake deals X damage to each creature without flying and each planeswalker.
data.flavor_text:
"Where will you run when I punish you with the very ground you flee on?"
—Nicol Bolas

data.name: Magmaquake
data.oracle_text: Magmaquake deals X damage to each creature without flying and each planeswalker.

data.name: Make Obsolete
data.oracle_text: Creatures your opponents control get -1/-1 until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: Yesterday's marvels are today's antiques.

data.name: Malicious Malfunction
data.oracle_text: All creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn. If a creature would die this turn, exile it instead.
data.flavor_text:
"That? A minor test, nothing more. Incompleat flesh is weak."
—Jin-Gitaxias

data.name: March of Souls
data.oracle_text: Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated. For each creature destroyed this way, its controller creates a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

data.name: Marsh Casualties
data.oracle_text:
Kicker {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell.)
Creatures target player controls get -1/-1 until end of turn. If this spell was kicked, those creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn instead.

data.name: Martial Coup
data.oracle_text: Create X 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens. If X is 5 or more, destroy all other creatures.
data.flavor_text: Their war forgotten, the nations of Bant stood united in the face of a common threat.

data.name: Martyr's Cry
data.oracle_text: Exile all white creatures. For each creature exiled this way, its controller draws a card.
data.flavor_text: "It is only fitting that one such as I should die in pursuit of knowledge." —Vervamon the Elder

data.name: Massacre
data.oracle_text:
If an opponent controls a Plains and you control a Swamp, you may cast this spell without paying its mana cost.
All creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn.

data.name: Mass Calcify
data.oracle_text: Destroy all nonwhite creatures.
data.flavor_text: The dead serve as their own tombstones.

data.name: Mephitic Vapors
data.oracle_text:
All creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.
Surveil 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)
data.flavor_text: Ravnica's safest strongholds are often neither.

data.name: Merciless Eviction
data.oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Exile all artifacts.
• Exile all creatures.
• Exile all enchantments.
• Exile all planeswalkers.
data.flavor_text:
"I once saw the Obzedat moved to action. Since that day, I've been thankful that they're mainly lazy, and dead."
—Aurelia, to Gideon Jura

data.name: Mizzium Mortars
data.oracle_text:
Mizzium Mortars deals 4 damage to target creature you don't control.
Overload {3}{R}{R}{R} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change "target" in its text to "each.")
data.set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

data.name: Mizzium Mortars
data.oracle_text:
Mizzium Mortars deals 4 damage to target creature you don't control.
Overload {3}{R}{R}{R} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change "target" in its text to "each.")

data.name: Mogg Infestation
data.oracle_text: Destroy all creatures target player controls. For each creature that died this way, that player creates two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.

data.name: Molten Disaster
data.oracle_text:
Kicker {R} (You may pay an additional {R} as you cast this spell.)
If this spell was kicked, it has split second. (As long as this spell is on the stack, players can't cast spells or activate abilities that aren't mana abilities.)
Molten Disaster deals X damage to each creature without flying and each player.

data.name: Mutilate
data.oracle_text: All creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn for each Swamp you control.
data.flavor_text:
"It's only torture if you're strong enough to survive. Otherwise, it's a simple, gruesome death. I'm happy either way."
—Liliana Vess

data.name: Mutilate
data.oracle_text: All creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn for each Swamp you control.
data.flavor_text: Liliana developed a fondness for the moment when roaring becomes squealing.

data.name: Mutilate
data.oracle_text: All creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn for each Swamp you control.
data.flavor_text:
"They appreciate my handiwork. I hear their joy in every scream."
—Chainer, dementia master

data.name: Nature's Ruin
data.oracle_text: Destroy all green creatures.
data.flavor_text: One chill blast—the exhalation of the grave.

data.name: Nausea
data.oracle_text: All creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: "Was it something I said?"

data.name: Nausea
data.oracle_text: All creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: No fear. No sense. And soon, no lunch.

data.name: Nausea
data.oracle_text: All creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: Any mogg will tell you there's nothing more nauseating than the smell of cute.

data.name: Necromantic Selection
data.oracle_text: Destroy all creatures, then return a creature card put into a graveyard this way to the battlefield under your control. It's a black Zombie in addition to its other colors and types. Exile Necromantic Selection.
data.flavor_text: It shambled from the cloud of ash and bone dust, undeterred by its own extinction.

data.name: Needle Storm
data.oracle_text: Needle Storm deals 4 damage to each creature with flying.
data.flavor_text: The rain is driven like nails.

data.name: Needle Storm
data.oracle_text: Needle Storm deals 4 damage to each creature with flying.

data.name: Nightmare Unmaking
data.oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Exile each creature with power greater than the number of cards in your hand.
• Exile each creature with power less than the number of cards in your hand.

data.name: Nylea's Intervention
data.oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Search your library for up to X land cards, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle.
• Nylea's Intervention deals twice X damage to each creature with flying.
data.flavor_text: "I bring a wilderness no law can tame."

data.name: Obliterate
data.oracle_text:
This spell can't be countered.
Destroy all artifacts, creatures, and lands. They can't be regenerated.
data.flavor_text: For his family, Barrin made a funeral pyre of Tolaria.

data.name: Oddly Uneven
data.oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Destroy each creature with an odd number of words in its name. (Hyphenated words are one word.)
• Destroy each creature with an even number of words in its name.
data.flavor_text: The odds are good, but the goods are odd.

data.name: Olivia's Wrath
data.oracle_text: Each non-Vampire creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of Vampires you control.
data.flavor_text:
"These worthless cattle think they can sneak unnoticed into my wedding? Dispose of them."
—Olivia Voldaren

data.name: Organic Extinction
data.oracle_text:
Improvise (Your artifacts can help cast this spell. Each artifact you tap after you're done activating mana abilities pays for {1}.)
Destroy all nonartifact creatures.
data.flavor_text:
"Technology evolves faster than a blade can swing."
—Arima, lead inventor of the Futurists

data.name: Outbreak
data.oracle_text:
You may discard a Swamp card rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Choose a creature type. All creatures of that type get -1/-1 until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: This plague chooses its victims.

data.name: Oversimplify
data.oracle_text: Exile all creatures. Each player creates a 0/0 green and blue Fractal creature token and puts a number of +1/+1 counters on it equal to the total power of creatures they controlled that were exiled this way.
data.flavor_text:
"A fine example of addition by subtraction."
—Deekah, professor of fractal theory

data.name: Overwhelming Forces
data.oracle_text: Destroy all creatures target opponent controls. Draw a card for each creature destroyed this way.
data.flavor_text: By the year 208, Cao Cao commanded more than 1,000 experienced generals and a million infantry, cavalry, and naval troops.

data.name: Part the Veil
data.oracle_text: Return all creatures you control to their owner's hand.
data.flavor_text: At the waterfall, the border between the humanoid and the spirit worlds was weakest. The kami moved across it with ease and at will.

data.name: Path of Peril
data.oracle_text:
Cleave {4}{W}{B} (You may cast this spell for its cleave cost. If you do, remove the words in square brackets.)
Destroy all creatures [with mana value 2 or less].
data.flavor_text: To Olivia's guests, a welcome. To everyone else, a warning.

data.name: Perish
data.oracle_text: Destroy all green creatures. They can't be regenerated.
data.flavor_text:
"There will come a time when the voices of soil and seedling will sing only laments."
—Oracle *en*-Vec

data.name: Perplexing Test
data.oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Return all creature tokens to their owners' hands.
• Return all nontoken creatures to their owners' hands.
data.flavor_text: "Your proofs were a bit nontraditional, but effective nonetheless. Full marks."

data.name: Pestilent Haze
data.oracle_text:
Choose one —
• All creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn.
• Remove two loyalty counters from each planeswalker.
data.flavor_text:
"Your crops will rot. The air itself will turn against you. You will suffer as I have suffered."
—Karaz, outcast

data.name: Phyrexian Rebirth
data.oracle_text: Destroy all creatures, then create an X/X colorless Phyrexian Horror artifact creature token, where X is the number of creatures destroyed this way.
data.flavor_text: As long as one drop of the oil exists, the joyous work continues.

data.name: Plague Wind
data.oracle_text: Destroy all creatures you don't control. They can't be regenerated.
data.flavor_text:
"The second wind of ascension is Reaver, slaying the unworthy."
—*Keld Triumphant*

data.name: Planar Despair
data.oracle_text: Domain — All creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn for each basic land type among lands you control.
data.flavor_text: All of Dominaria recoiled as Yawgmoth and his retainers arrived.

data.name: Planar Outburst
data.oracle_text:
Destroy all nonland creatures.
Awaken 4—{5}{W}{W}{W} (If you cast this spell for {5}{W}{W}{W}, also put four +1/+1 counters on target land you control and it becomes a 0/0 Elemental creature with haste. It's still a land.)

data.name: Promise of Loyalty
data.oracle_text: Each player puts a vow counter on a creature they control and sacrifices the rest. Each of those creatures can't attack you or planeswalkers you control for as long as it has a vow counter on it.
data.flavor_text: "It's us against the world. Forever."

data.name: Psychotic Haze
data.oracle_text:
Psychotic Haze deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.
Madness {1}{B} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

data.name: Puppet's Verdict
data.oracle_text: Flip a coin. If you win the flip, destroy all creatures with power 2 or less. If you lose the flip, destroy all creatures with power 3 or greater.
data.flavor_text:
"What was heads again?"
—Mercadian magistrate

data.name: Pyroclasm
data.oracle_text: Pyroclasm deals 2 damage to each creature.
data.flavor_text:
"When the air burns, only death breathes deep."
—Bogardan mage

data.name: Pyroclasm
data.oracle_text: Pyroclasm deals 2 damage to each creature.
data.flavor_text:
"When the air burns, only death breathes deep."
—Bogardan mage

data.name: Pyroclasm
data.oracle_text: Pyroclasm deals 2 damage to each creature.
data.flavor_text: Chaos does not choose its enemies.

data.name: Pyroclasm
data.oracle_text: Pyroclasm deals 2 damage to each creature.
data.flavor_text:
"Leaves more room for the big ones to fight in, you know."
—Jaya Ballard, Task Mage

data.name: Pyroclasm
data.oracle_text: Pyroclasm deals 2 damage to each creature.

data.name: Radiant Flames
data.oracle_text: Converge — Radiant Flames deals X damage to each creature, where X is the number of colors of mana spent to cast this spell.
data.flavor_text: The fires of Zendikar are always hungry, and there is much on which they can feed.

data.name: Radiant Flames
data.oracle_text: Converge — Radiant Flames deals X damage to each creature, where X is the number of colors of mana spent to cast this spell.
data.flavor_text: The fires of Zendikar are always hungry, and there is much on which they can feed.

data.name: Radiating Lightning
data.oracle_text: Radiating Lightning deals 3 damage to target player and 1 damage to each creature that player controls.
data.flavor_text: As the Cabal legions pushed into Shiv, they learned not to stand so close together.

data.name: Rain of Daggers
data.oracle_text: Destroy all creatures target opponent controls. You lose 2 life for each creature destroyed this way.
data.flavor_text: Knives in the sky, cries in the air, and blood on the ground.

data.name: Rain of Embers
data.oracle_text: Rain of Embers deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.
data.flavor_text: There's plenty to talk about in the marketplaces of Ravnica, be it the latest feud between guilds or the terrible weather.

data.name: Rancid Earth
data.oracle_text:
Destroy target land.
Threshold — If seven or more cards are in your graveyard, instead destroy that land and Rancid Earth deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.

data.name: Reckless Endeavor
data.oracle_text: Roll two d12 and choose one result. Reckless Endeavor deals damage equal to that result to each creature. Then create a number of Treasure tokens equal to the other result.
data.flavor_text: Which burns more fiercely? Your ambition, or the flame?

data.name: Reign of Terror
data.oracle_text: Destroy all green creatures or all white creatures. They can't be regenerated. You lose 2 life for each creature that died this way.
data.flavor_text:
"I don't know what takes them; they die around me without time to scream."
—Scout Ekemet, final journal

data.name: Retaliate
data.oracle_text: Destroy all creatures that dealt damage to you this turn.
data.flavor_text: The Auriok learned perseverance from their forebears. They learned justice from the leonin.

data.name: Retribution of the Meek
data.oracle_text: Destroy all creatures with power 4 or greater. They can't be regenerated.
data.flavor_text:
"Tread upon the meek, and they shall wound your feet and make you crawl."
—Asmira, Holy Avenger

data.name: Righteous Fury
data.oracle_text: Destroy all tapped creatures. You gain 2 life for each creature destroyed this way.

data.name: Rising Miasma
data.oracle_text:
All creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn.
Awaken 3—{5}{B}{B} (If you cast this spell for {5}{B}{B}, also put three +1/+1 counters on target land you control and it becomes a 0/0 Elemental creature with haste. It's still a land.)

data.name: Ritual of Soot
data.oracle_text: Destroy all creatures with mana value 3 or less.
data.flavor_text: Only the patrol's armor was found, so tainted with the acrid smell of sudden death that it could never be worn again.

data.name: Riveteers Confluence
data.oracle_text:
Choose three. You may choose the same mode more than once.
• You draw a card and you lose 1 life.
• Riveteers Confluence deals 1 damage to each creature and planeswalker you don't control.
• You may put a land card from your hand or graveyard onto the battlefield tapped.

data.name: Rollick of Abandon
data.oracle_text: All creatures get +2/-2 until end of turn.
data.flavor_text:
"Embrace every moment, for it could be your last."
—Xenagos, god of revels

data.name: Rolling Earthquake
data.oracle_text: Rolling Earthquake deals X damage to each creature without horsemanship and each player.

data.name: Rolling Spoil
data.oracle_text: Destroy target land. If {B} was spent to cast this spell, all creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: The shadow that fell over the grove was silent yet horribly alive, roiling with millions of tiny minions dedicated to the process of rot.

data.name: Rolling Temblor
data.oracle_text:
Rolling Temblor deals 2 damage to each creature without flying.
Flashback {4}{R}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
data.flavor_text: When demons open a path to your front door, it's time to move.

data.name: Rout
data.oracle_text:
You may cast Rout as though it had flash if you pay {2} more to cast it. (You may cast it any time you could cast an instant.)
Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated.
data.flavor_text:
"End this. What I seek is far greater."
—Elesh Norn, Grand Cenobite

data.name: Rout
data.oracle_text:
You may cast Rout as though it had flash if you pay {2} more to cast it. (You may cast it any time you could cast an instant.)
Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated.

data.name: Rupture
data.oracle_text: Sacrifice a creature. Rupture deals damage equal to that creature's power to each creature without flying and each player.
data.flavor_text: All creatures have an inner fire. Releasing it can be dangerous.

data.name: Rupture
data.oracle_text: Sacrifice a creature. Rupture deals damage equal to that creature's power to each creature without flying and each player.
data.flavor_text: All creatures have an inner fire. Releasing it can be dangerous.

data.name: Sagittars' Volley
data.oracle_text: Destroy target creature with flying. Sagittars' Volley deals 1 damage to each creature with flying your opponents control.
data.flavor_text:
"My bowstring hums in tune with the song of the Worldsoul."
—Alcarus, Selesnya sagittar

data.name: Savage Alliance
data.oracle_text:
Escalate {1} (Pay this cost for each mode chosen beyond the first.)
Choose one or more —
• Creatures target player controls gain trample until end of turn.
• Savage Alliance deals 2 damage to target creature.
• Savage Alliance deals 1 damage to each creature target opponent controls.

data.name: Savage Twister
data.oracle_text: Savage Twister deals X damage to each creature.
data.flavor_text:
"Nature is the ultimate mindless destroyer, capable of power and ferocity no army can match, and the Gruul follow its example."
—Trigori, Azorius senator

data.name: Savage Twister
data.oracle_text: Savage Twister deals X damage to each creature.
data.flavor_text:
"Nature is the ultimate mindless destroyer, capable of power and ferocity no army can match, and the Gruul follow its example."
—Trigori, Azorius senator

data.name: Savage Twister
data.oracle_text: Savage Twister deals X damage to each creature.
data.flavor_text:
"Frozen, we watched the funnel pluck up three of the goats—pook! pook! pook!—before we ran for the wadi."
—*Travelogue of Najat*

data.name: Scouring Sands
data.oracle_text: Scouring Sands deals 1 damage to each creature your opponents control. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
data.flavor_text: When Purphoros cleans the ashes from his forge, entire cities vanish.

data.name: Sculpted Sunburst
data.oracle_text: Choose a creature you control, then each opponent chooses a creature they control with equal or lesser power. If you chose a creature this way, exile each creature not chosen by any player this way.
data.set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
data.flavor_text: A searing light that spares only the chosen.

data.name: Seismic Rupture
data.oracle_text: Seismic Rupture deals 2 damage to each creature without flying.
data.flavor_text: The shaman opened the earth beneath their feet, trapping the survivors within the crevices of Ayagor for Atarka to devour at her leisure.

data.name: Seismic Shudder
data.oracle_text: Seismic Shudder deals 1 damage to each creature without flying.
data.flavor_text:
"The land here seems to go out of its way to kill you."
—Chandra Nalaar

data.name: Seismic Wave
data.oracle_text: Seismic Wave deals 2 damage to any target and 1 damage to each nonartifact creature target opponent controls.
data.flavor_text: "Step carefully, Imperial. Even the earth rises against you."

data.name: Settle the Wreckage
data.oracle_text: Exile all attacking creatures target player controls. That player may search their library for that many basic land cards, put those cards onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

data.name: Shadowstorm
data.oracle_text: Shadowstorm deals 2 damage to each creature with shadow.
data.flavor_text:
"You've not seen a storm until you've seen the kind that roars between worlds."
—Lyna, Soltari emissary

data.name: Shadows' Verdict
data.oracle_text: Exile all creatures and planeswalkers with mana value 3 or less from the battlefield and all creature and planeswalker cards with mana value 3 or less from all graveyards.
data.flavor_text: The shadows of death fall over everyone in the end.

data.name: Shake the Foundations
data.oracle_text:
Shake the Foundations deals 1 damage to each creature without flying.
Draw a card.
data.flavor_text: A threefold calamity with a single will.

data.name: Shatter the Sky
data.oracle_text: Each player who controls a creature with power 4 or greater draws a card. Then destroy all creatures.
data.flavor_text: When the gods go to war, mortals pay the highest price.

data.name: Shrivel
data.oracle_text: All creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.
data.flavor_text:
"Have you ever killed insects nibbling at your crops? I think that's what the Eldrazi believe they're doing to us."
—Sheyda, Ondu gamekeeper

data.name: Sickening Dreams
data.oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard X cards.
Sickening Dreams deals X damage to each creature and each player.
data.flavor_text: The Patriarch dreams of vile plague.

data.name: Simoon
data.oracle_text: Simoon deals 1 damage to each creature target opponent controls.
data.flavor_text: Hot wind whipped up as if the weather itself wanted to fight Phyrexians.

data.name: Simoon
data.oracle_text: Simoon deals 1 damage to each creature target opponent controls.
data.flavor_text:
"The black-and-white sacred monkey holds her children to her, and waits."
—"Love Song of Night and Day"

data.name: Single Combat
data.oracle_text: Each player chooses a creature or planeswalker they control, then sacrifices the rest. Players can't cast creature or planeswalker spells until the end of your next turn.
data.flavor_text: Not even a threat to the entire Multiverse could persuade them to put aside their feud.

data.name: Skyreaping
data.oracle_text: Skyreaping deals damage to each creature with flying equal to your devotion to green. (Each {G} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to green.)

data.name: Slagstorm
data.oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Slagstorm deals 3 damage to each creature.
• Slagstorm deals 3 damage to each player.
data.flavor_text:
"As long as we have the will to fight, we are never without weapons."
—Koth of the Hammer

data.name: Slash the Ranks
data.oracle_text: Destroy all creatures and planeswalkers except for commanders.
data.flavor_text: The generals each surveyed their devastated forces. Then, slowly, they turned to each other and raised their swords.

data.name: Slaughter the Strong
data.oracle_text: Each player chooses any number of creatures they control with total power 4 or less, then sacrifices all other creatures they control.
data.set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
data.flavor_text: It was a big day for the gravediggers at Cliffside Cemetery.

data.name: Slaughter the Strong
data.oracle_text: Each player chooses any number of creatures they control with total power 4 or less, then sacrifices all other creatures they control.
data.flavor_text:
"Cut the beasts out from under them and their strength is nothing."
—Vona of Iedo, Butcher of Magan

data.name: Slice and Dice

Cycling {2}{R} ({2}{R}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

data.name: Solar Blaze
data.oracle_text: Each creature deals damage to itself equal to its power.
data.flavor_text:
"The primary weapon is nothing more than light. It shows them what they are, and they burn of their own accord."
—Aurelia

• Destroy all creatures with power 2 or less.

data.name: Soulquake
data.oracle_text: Return all creatures on the battlefield and all creature cards in graveyards to their owners' hands.

Return each creature your opponents control with toughness X or less to its owner's hand, where X is the number of Islands you control.

—Alfred, Lord Tennyson, *In Memoriam*

data.name: Squall Line

data.name: Star of Extinction

—Shaper Pashona

data.flavor_text: Ever since the disaster, the city's survivors viewed the star-strewn sky with dread.

data.oracle_text:
Starstorm deals X damage to each creature.
Cycling {3} ({3}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
data.flavor_text: Pardic barbarians didn't complain when the Order started blaming every crisis on the Cabal.

data.name: Steam Blast

data.name: Stench of Decay
data.oracle_text: Nonartifact creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.
data.flavor_text:
"Disa is dead, and I am left. I shall allow no others to succumb to this pestilence."
—Kolbjörn, High Honored Druid

data.name: Stench of Decay
data.oracle_text: Nonartifact creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.
data.flavor_text:
"My lord, there is only so much I can do. This plague infests Krov worse than any other city."
—Halvor Arensson, Kjeldoran Priest

data.name: Stick Together
data.oracle_text: Each player chooses a party from among creatures they control, then sacrifices the rest. (To choose a party, choose up to one each of Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and Wizard.)
data.set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
data.flavor_text: Every veteran adventurer will tell you to stick with your party, because the ones who split up aren't around to give advice.

data.name: Storm's Wrath
data.oracle_text: Storm's Wrath deals 4 damage to each creature and each planeswalker.
data.flavor_text: Distant thunder rumbled, a dread forewarning of Keranos's displeasure.

data.name: Strategy, Schmategy
data.oracle_text:
Roll a six-sided die. Strategy, Schmategy has the indicated effect.
1 — Do nothing.
2 — Destroy all artifacts.
3 — Destroy all lands.
4 — Strategy, Schmategy deals 3 damage to each creature and each player.
5 — Each player discards their hand and draws seven cards.
6 — Repeat this process two more times.

data.name: Street Spasm
data.oracle_text:
Street Spasm deals X damage to target creature without flying you don't control.
Overload {X}{X}{R}{R} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of "target" with "each.")

data.name: Structural Assault
data.oracle_text: Destroy all artifacts, then Structural Assault deals damage to each creature equal to the number of artifacts that were put into graveyards from the battlefield this turn.
data.flavor_text: After the attack on the Vantoleone, the fragile balance of power shattered completely, and the city descended into chaos.

data.name: Sublime Exhalation
data.oracle_text:
Undaunted (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each opponent.)
Destroy all creatures.
data.flavor_text: Exhale, and let the winds carry your soul for all eternity.

data.name: Subterranean Tremors
data.oracle_text: Subterranean Tremors deals X damage to each creature without flying. If X is 4 or more, destroy all artifacts. If X is 8 or more, create an 8/8 red Lizard creature token.
data.flavor_text: The market is now closed.
